titleStmt.title: The nature of God's kingdom and dominion over men clearly laid open and explained, as the same relates to these following particulars ... in a discourse on Deut. 8.2. wherein is likewise shewed, what influence these things ought to have upon our life and conversation / by Richard Stafford.
titleStmt.author: Stafford, Richard, 1663-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by E. Whitlock ...,
